selectors.label: Time Period
selectors.description: The time period over which the data is measured.

values.label: Daily
values.description: Data measured at a daily time scale.

values.label: Monthly
values.description: Data measured at a monthly time scale.

layerCategories.label: Station Data
layerCategories.description: These options apply only to the station data displayed on the map. Gridded map products are generated using partial filled station data.

selectors.label: Data Fill
selectors.description: The type of processing the station data goes through.

values.label: Partial Filled
values.description: This data has undergone QA/QC and is partially filled using statistical techniques to estimate some missing station values.

values.label: Unfilled
values.description: Station data including only values provided by stations before going through QA/QC.
